**2021:** [**Surfing Ocean Data in the Cloud**](https://podaac.jpl.nasa.gov/animations/Webinar_Surfing_Ocean_Data_in_the_Cloud_Beginners_Guide_PO.DAAC_NASA_Earthdata_Cloud) - The Beginner's Guide to PO.DAAC in the NASA Earthdata Cloud.
